jobDescription: Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines and cloud-based data infrastructure.  Work with data scientists and analysts to ensure seamless data integration and accessibility.  Focus on ETL/ELT processes, workflow orchestration (Airflow), and GCP services (Cloud Storage, DataProc, Cloud Run, Pub/Sub, BigQuery). Develop dashboards using Looker, Metabase, and Superset.
